## IWaitForExitResultWithoutOutput interface

The result of running a process to completion using [Executable.waitForExitAsync()](./node-core-library.executable.waitforexitasync_2.md)<></>. This interface does not include stdout or stderr output because an [IWaitForExitOptions.encoding](./node-core-library.iwaitforexitoptions.encoding.md) was not specified.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IWaitForExitResultWithoutOutput 
```

The process exit code. If the process was terminated, this will be null.

</td><td>


</td><td>

string \| null


</td><td>

The process signal that terminated the process. If the process exited normally, this will be null.
